text: can we connect this to an oculus rift and walk our space?
I've run around the sign up sheet for Arya topics. Here are the people who have stepped up to represent us on the various topics:

• Unifying Aesthetic (Ewald, Justin, Amanda)
• A/V (Ewald, Charles, Josh, Joel, Joshua)
• Photo Studio (Ewald, Abby, Phillip)
• Design/Crit (Matt, Phillip)
• Entry/Welcome (Matt, Marcelino)
• Craft (Justin, Jason)
• Kitchen (Melissa, Evans, Kat)
• Friends (Marcelino)
• Social Space (Kat, Melissa)
• Bathroom (Kat)
• Art (Gaston, Abby, Jason)
• Recreation
• Bike Storage (Trent, Joel, Spencer, Jenny, Gaston, Melissa)
• Lab (Josh, Joel, Spencer, Gaston)
• Lighting (Evans, Josh)
• Personal Area (Charles, Amanda)
• AwayFromDesk Workspace (Jenny, Kat, Spencer, Amanda)

Follow up from here is getting these people together to define the adjectives/qualities of these topics, identify the problem space, think about sizes, priorities, and references, and otherwise help our architect help us.
I'll either join or follow up with these groups; first I'll try to coordinate some huddles.
